rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
When the heaven is cleft asunder,
When the planets are dispersed,
When the seas are poured forth,
And the sepulchres are overturned,
A soul will know what it hath sent before (it) and what left behind.

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
rows.translation: O man! What hath made thee careless concerning thy Lord, the Bountiful,
Who created thee, then fashioned, then proportioned thee?

rows.arabic: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
rows.translation: Into whatsoever form He will, He casteth thee.
rows.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratim mā shā-a rakkabak

rows.translation: Nay, but ye deny the Judgment.
Lo! there are above you guardians,
Generous and recording,
Who know (all) that ye do.
Lo! the righteous verily will be in delight.
And lo! the wicked verily will be in hell;
They will burn therein on the Day of Judgment,
And will not be absent thence.
Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!
rows.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
rows.translation: Again, what will convey unto thee what the Day of Judgment is!
rows.transliteration: thumma mā adrāka mā yawmud dīn

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
rows.translation: A day on which no soul hath power at all for any (other) soul. The (absolute) command on that day is Allah's.
rows.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsul linafsin shay-ā ۖ wal-amru yawma-idhin lillāh
